channel.description: Recent content in publications on Fink broker

item.title: Publications
item.description: List of publications from the Fink collaboration and the larger astronomy community that uses Fink public data. 2023 The Tiny Time-series Transformer: Low-latency High-throughput Classification of Astronomical Transients using Deep Model Compression, Tarek Allam Jr., Julien Peloton, Jason D. McEwen 2022 Finding active galactic nuclei through Fink, Etienne Russeil, Emille E. O. Ishida, Roman Le Montagner, Julien Peloton, Anais Moller Enabling the discovery of fast transients: A kilonova science module for the Fink broker, B.
